code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const fetchArticles=async params=>{try{const response=await api.get('/articles',{params});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching articles:',error);throw error;}};export const trackArticleView=async articleId=>{try{await api.post(`/articles/${articleId}/view`);}catch(error){console.error('Error tracking article view:',error);}};export const shareArticle=async(articleId,platform)=>{try{await api.post(`/articles/${articleId}/share`,{platform});}catch(error){console.error('Error tracking share:',error);}};export default api;
